akn:section.akn:heading: Cigarette tax stamps purchased or held prior to effective date; payment of tax; records.

akn:content.akn:p: Any wholesaler, retailer, or vending machine operator licensed under ยง 47-2404(b) who has purchased any cigarette tax stamps, affixed to a cigarette package or otherwise, prior to July 1, 1993, or that are otherwise held on July 1, 1993, shall:
For the purposes of this section, a tax stamp shall be considered to be held by a wholesaler, retailer, or vending machine operator:
Any violations of this section shall be punishable as provided in ยง 47-2414 [repealed].
Prosecutions under this section shall be brought on information in the Superior Court of the District of Columbia by the Attorney General for the District of Columbia.
